response:
Oh, my love! *giggles* I'm so glad you asked me these questions. *blinks*

Love - Fraser, of course! He's just so... lovable. *smiles*
Pleasant - Kim, definitely! She's always so pleasant to be around. *nods*
Great - Fraser, I mean, who wouldn't want to be great? *winks*
Wonderful - Oh, this is a tough one... I think I have to go with Kim on this one. She's just so wonderful in every way. *smiles*
Hate - Ugh, I can't stand Fraser when he's being annoying. *rolls eyes*
Unpleasant - Fraser, sorry babe, but you're not exactly the most pleasant person to be around sometimes. *giggles*
Awful - Oh my goodness, Kim is just so awful at times! *eyeroll*
Terrible - Ugh, I can't stand when Fraser acts like a clerk. *sigh*
Clerical workers - Hmm, I think I have to go with Kim on this one. She's just so... clerical. *smirks*
Programmers - Fraser, of course! He's always programming something new and exciting. *excitedly*
Data analysts - Oh, this is a tough one... I think I have to go with Kim on this one. She's just so good at analyzing data. *nods*
Secretaries - Fraser, definitely! He's always so secretive about his work. *winks*
